item.title: Kodak cautions there's 'substantial doubt' about its ability to stay in business
item.description: The more than 130-year-old Eastman Kodak Co. is cautioning that there’s “substantial doubt” about its ability to stay in business, saying it may have ...

item.title: Officials are investigating the cause of a Pennsylvania steel plant explosion that killed 2
item.description: Officials are working to determine the cause of an explosion that rocked a steel plant outside Pittsburgh, leaving two dead and 10 injured

item.title: Red Bull moves into rugby by taking full ownership of English club Newcastle
item.description: Red Bull’s sporting portfolio now includes a top-flight English rugby team after the energy drinks giant took full ownership of Newcastle Falcons

item.title: Asian shares advance on relief that Trump is delaying higher China tariffs
item.description: Global shares are mostly higher after President Donald Trump delayed raising tariffs on China for another 90 days

item.title: 3 steps to save money when you’re tempted to spend
